--- title: Utility functions keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This module includes video and audio utilities to go along with the core module to make synthetic video generation a smooth experience." description: "This module includes video and audio utilities to go along with the core module to make synthetic video generation a smooth experience." nb_path: "00_utils.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Time utils

A collection of functions for time related operations.

{% raw %}

to_hhmmss[source]

to_hhmmss(x:int)

Convert time from secs (int) to hh:mm:ss (str).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
to_hhmmss(5)

'00:00:05'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert to_hhmmss(100) == '00:01:40'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
to_hhmmss(10000)

'02:46:40'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

to_secs[source]

to_secs(x:str)

Convert time from hh:mm:ss (str) format to seconds (int).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
to_secs('02:46:40')

10000
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert to_secs('00:00:05') == 5
{% endraw %}

Video utils

A collection of functions for video related operations

{% raw %}

trim_video[source]

trim_video(video, start, end, outfile=None)

Crop a video in place from start to end. If you don't want to crop inplace, provide output filename. For youtube videos you can download_youtube_video before cropping it

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

check_resolution[source]

check_resolution(video:Union[str, Path])

Check the resolution of a video. Output is in the form of height, width

Args: video (Union[str, Path]): Path to video file.

Returns: Dict: height and width of the video

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
check_resolution('Anna.mp4')

{'height': 720, 'width': 1280}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert check_resolution('Anna.mp4') == {'height': 720, 'width': 1280}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

check_fps[source]

check_fps(video:Union[str, Path])

Get the fps of a video

Args: video (Union[str, Path]): Path of the video

Returns: float: fps of the video

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
check_fps('Anna.mp4')

29.97
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert check_fps('Anna.mp4') == 29.97
{% endraw %}

Audio utils

A collection of functions for audio related operations

{% raw %}

change_audio_format[source]

change_audio_format(audio:Union[str, Path], outfile:Union[str, Path])

Change the format of audio file. Example, converting mp3 to wav. Works with all formats supported by ffmpeg.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
change_audio_format('demo_audio.wav', 'my_audio.mp3')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
change_audio_format('my_audio.mp3', 'another_audio.flac')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

trim_audio[source]

trim_audio(audio:Union[str, Path], start_time:int, end_time:int, outfile:Union[str, Path]='trimmed_audio.mp3')

Trim an audio file. Works with all formats supported by ffmpeg.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
trim_audio('my_audio.mp3', 0, 5)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
trim_audio('my_audio.mp3', 0, 5, 'small_audio.mp3')
{% endraw %}

Note: The output can be in a different format

{% raw %} 
trim_audio('my_audio.mp3', 0, 5, 'small_audio.wav')
{% endraw %}
